original_title: Smokin Joe Kubek/Bnois King - My Heart's in Texas
overview: This blazing New Year's Eve performance at the legendary J&J Blues Bar in Forth Worth, Texas is this veteran duo's first DVD. Holiday cheer and roadhouse ambiance make for a uniquely satisfying taste of Joe and Bnois trademark Texas blues.
title: Smokin Joe Kubek/Bnois King - My Heart's in Texas
